methods.addTable:
Add a table to this registrar.

:param liveTable: (io.deephaven.db.tables.live.LiveTable) - The table to add
methods.removeTable:
Remove a table from this registrar.

:param runnable: (io.deephaven.db.tables.live.LiveTable) - The table to remove

text: On refresh, each of the enqueued runnables is executed.
